name: @reactivemarkets/desktop-core
description: A cross platform hosting environment for multi-window applications

scripts.pack: npm run pack:pre && npm run pack:asar && npm run pack:post
scripts.pack:pre: copyfiles -f desktop.json dist && rname dist/desktop.json dist/package.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && npm run serve
